Blog.post: My grandma bought me a car today. Now I have to go out and get a job to pay for insurance and pay her back. Woohoo...
I went to my dads funeral today. I was a Pual barrer, I think that is what it was called... In other words I carried the casket along with some others. It was depressing, as most funerals are.
I went to my father wake today. I got to see the family that I havent seen. Plus alot of people I didn't know. It was an open casket, I only took a short look.
I had a decent day. Hung out with Mersia. Came home and then got word my Father died... It was shocking. Heart attack at 52 yrs old. Sucks.

Woot home from texas. Fun time. I drove a scooter into a couch then nocked a table with a plant over. I didn't even get in trouble. However kirk got in lots of trouble all the time. For not doing much at all. The rodeo we went to was fun, they were very mean to the animals and yeah... six flags was cool. (The blog dates are wrong.. had to remake the blog. So I posted the actual dates for the topic.)
I went to a job interview at target, then they gave me a second interview on the spot. Now they say they will call me. However I dont expect a call back.
Saw spiderman 2 again today(2nd time). Well it was good, nothing seemed to change between the first time i saw it and the second.
Went job searching again today. So that makes it.. target, walmart, carabou coffee, franks, boston market, cub, byerlys (sp)? But yeah. Hopefully franks or carabou. Those would be best.

Wohoo, I got a job today. At byerlys or how ever you spell it. I start shortly after the 20th of this month. Well, my bro is leaving for DC monday. So wohoo again. However my pictures for site wont be comming for another week becuase he has the camera.

I haven't updated news in awhile, been to busy. Well, good news first. I got a job, I started working. It's an awesome place to work there is so many extra benifits and such working there. It's Byerly's btw. But yeah bad news. My family is depressed. Mom and G'ma espesually. Mom locked herself in room today scared rest of us to death. Police were called to break in. Sucked ass. This is all due to stress coming from the huge legal battle of my dads funds after he died, and how we have NO money left at all. Every bill is becoming late. Even worse, my mom can't take it anymore. She has been put thruo so much she is bursting. Now it is up to me and my brother, 16 and 17 yr olds to fight our grandfather(Dad's dad) in court for the rightful money that is ours. The hatred between certian family members and others is at its peak. Shit is hitting the fan. On top of that our lawyers trust is in jepreody. I am sure tomarrow will play a major roll in My mom's, Borther's, g'ma's, and My future. If I dont post for awhile it's becuase we will need to cut internet to save money. We'll see what happens.

Woohoo, after two cop visits to my home. Things have settled down. The legal battle is near end. Grandfather decided to leave what is spoze to be ours to us. Well, I wont beilve that initll I see it. Well anyways, work is going good, I've worked 19 hours this week and I've only been working there 4 days. Anit that awesome. COming closer to the metallica concert, cant wait.

Well, what has happend... We got our first SS checks this week. Woot. I also got my first paycheck. I should be getting memory I wanted for my computer next tuesday. It's going to be awesome. I can't wait till Metallica on the 16th. Thanks kimmy for the tix!
